definitions.definition: A quilt or usually flat cloth bag with a filling (traditionally down ) and usually an additional washable cover, used instead of blankets ; often called a comforter or quilt , especially in US English.

main_definition: ( British , Ireland , New Zealand , Canada ) A quilt or usually flat cloth bag with a filling (traditionally down ) and usually an additional washable cover, used instead of blankets ; often called a comforter or quilt , especially in US English.
